titleStmt.title: To God alone let us all glory give, by whose permission we poor mortals live ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, and J. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Title from first two lines of text.
Verse: "To God alone let us all glory give ..."

Printed on verso: The Kentish maiden (Wing K326).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
